mapper.select: select id, username, content, DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as createtime from spittr order by createtime desc limit #{count};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spittr (username, userid, content, createtime) VALUES (#{Spittr.username}, #{Spittr.userid}, #{Spittr.content}, #{Spittr.createtime})
